PySALÂ¶

Install Getting Started Documentation Report Bugs

Releases

  • Stable 1.8.0 - July 31, 2014
  • Development 1.9.0dev

PySAL is an open source library of spatial analysis functions written in Python intended to support the development of high level applications. PySAL is licensed under the BSD License.
